title: Game Crashes PLEASE HELP RITO
body: Can anyone help me? I can get into champ select and pick my champion. The game then loads 100% everyone in but as soon as the game pops us my comp freezes and makes a buzzing sound. Not sure if its the patch or something to do with my comp. I have repaired the game and redownloaded it. I'm not sure what else to do but this didn't start happening until August 11th. Any info would be greatly appreciated. Please help!!!!!

replies.body:
From your description, *specifically* the hard system lock and buzzing noise, it sounds like your PC is experiencing hardware or operating system issues. I strongly suggest working through our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions. 

Let me know if you continue to have these issues after working through those steps.
I have went through all the Bugsplat and Crash guide. Nothing has changed in me not being able to play the game. I'm not sure of what else to do or try.

Since that guide of quick steps wasn't able to help you resolve the issue, it will take deeper investigation to find the core problem. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), where a specialist can dive into some logs to find the cause to your issues. 

If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), you'll be able to provide our techs with a great amount of context when you attach the logs to your request.

Let me know if you have any questions.
